Content.Headline: Information from the technical evaluation report
Content.Content: Quick introdution where the basic information of the report is shown.

Content.Headline: Developer and TOE information
Content.Content: Quick introdution where the basic information of the component and its developer is shown. This includes: Component under test + version + Developer of the component

Chapters.Headline: Description of the TOE
Chapters.Content: Functional description of the TOE. Inventory of security functions identified in the security statement

Chapters.Headline: Execution environment
Chapters.Content: Description of the execution environment for the tests including the tools used for it, the operating system in wich it was tested, etc

Chapters.Headline: Review and test results
Chapters.Content: Quick summary of the results of the main aspects of the evaluation where it is clear wether these tests passed or fail.  This chapter will be divided in the different aspects that the evaluation tested, this includes documentation review, security review, functional review, etc. All of this parts of the validation will be structured in a way that can easily be understood the type of testing done for each of them and the result of that validation. As a last division of this chapter, it will be included a traceability matrix that link all the test cases done with the trust profile criteria that it validates.

Chapters.Headline: Evaluation Verdict
Chapters.Content: In this chapter, the final verdict of the validation is stated. This chapter is divided in the same categories as the previous (documentation, security, functional, etc). It also exposes the result of the security profile criteria and an evaluation of the tests done against the component.
